data.title: Capitol Music Group
data.meta_description: Capitol Music Group (CMG) is comprised of Capitol Records, Blue Note Records, Motown Records, Astralwerks, Priority Records and Capitol Christian Music Group. Capitol Music Group is a subsidiary of Universal Music Group and is headquartered in the world-famous Capitol Tower in Hollywood, California. For more than 75 years, Capitol has played a significant role in popular culture as one of the world’s premiere music companies, and its flagship label, Capitol Records, was the first to be based on the west coast of the United States. data.text:
Capitol Music Group (CMG) is comprised of Capitol Records, Blue Note Records, Motown Records, Astralwerks, Priority Records and Capitol Christian Music Group. Capitol Music Group is a subsidiary of Universal Music Group and is headquartered in the world-famous Capitol Tower in Hollywood, California.

For more than 75 years, Capitol has played a significant role in popular culture as one of the world’s premiere music companies, and its flagship label, Capitol Records, was the first to be based on the west coast of the United States.
